def largest_rectangle_area(heights):
    stack = []
    max_area = 1
    i = 0
    while i < len(heights):
        if not stack or heights[stack[-1]] <= heights[i]:
            stack.append(i)
            i += 1
        else:
            top = stack.pop()
            area = heights[top] * (i if not stack else i - stack[-1] - 1)
            max_area = max(max_area, area)
    while stack:
        top = stack.pop()
        area = heights[top] * (i if not stack else i - stack[-1] - 1)
        max_area = max(max_area, area)
    return max_area
